reviews.review_msg: Very easy exams, just read the lectures. The tutorials were useless but you had to go for marks. Lecture was boring but overall easy to do well

Lectures were boring, but interesting. The midterms were extremely easy and were mostly based on the lecture slides as well as the videos shown in class. The assignments were worth a large % too, but it really depends on your TA (if they're a hard marker or not).
Mike is a good teacher! He is very knowledgeable on the subject. He does not require a textbook for the course and he gives you all his notes. I would recommend him.

Lectures are very boring and he uses iclicker so you have to attend because participation is 20%. The assignments are clear but he does not come to class a lot so the TA's teach or we have a boring guest lecture. I would never take a class with him again.
An easy class, with easy exams, and a relaxed grading scheme. Easy GPA booster if you put a little effort into it. Lectures do have too much information in them, but it's not a big deal.
his lectures are very dry and he includes too much information and details which are not necessary. wording on the exam is unclear and is misinterpreted by everyone, even TA's.

I will NEVER take another class with him again! He's not a mean person or anything, but he's just very dry. I could hardly stay awake in classes and most of the time when he lectured I was playing games on my laptop or DS =S
